id.description: A unique identifier for the audio component
id.description_zh: audio 组件的唯一标识符

src.description: The address of the resource from which the audio is to be played
src.description_zh: 要播放音频的资源地址

loop.description: Whether or not to play on a loop

controls.description: Whether to display the default controls

poster.description: The image resource address of the audio cover on the default control, if the controls property value is false, the poster setting is invalid
poster.description_zh: 默认控件上的音频封面的图片资源地址，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 poster 无效

name.description: The name of the audio on the default control, if the value of the controls property is false, the name setting is invalid
name.description_zh: 默认控件上的音频名字，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 name 无效

author.description: The author name on the default control, if the controls property value is false, the author is set to be invalid
author.description_zh: 默认控件上的作者名字，如果 controls 属性值为 false 则设置 author 无效

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

onError.description: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，detail = {errMsg: MediaError.code}
onError.description_zh: 当发生错误时触发 error 事件，detail = {errMsg: MediaError.code}

onPlay.description: The play event is triggered when playback is started/resumed
onPlay.description_zh: 当开始/继续播放时触发play事件

onPause.description: The pause event is triggered when playback is paused
onPause.description_zh: 当暂停播放时触发 pause 事件

onTimeUpdate.description: 当播放进度改变时触发 timeupdate 事件，detail = {currentTime, duration}
onTimeUpdate.description_zh: 当播放进度改变时触发 timeupdate 事件，detail = {currentTime, duration}

onEnded.description: The ended event is triggered when the playback reaches the end
onEnded.description_zh: 当播放到末尾时触发 ended 事件
